title: Miracle Winter - February 3 - Hats
content: This Saturday, February 3, 2024, Maplers on all Worlds will have Miracle Time enabled for Hat Equipment!

title: Miracle Winter - January 27 - Gloves
content: This Saturday, January 27, 2024, Maplers on all Worlds will have Miracle Time enabled for Gloves!

title: Miracle Winter - January 20 - Accessories/Emblems/Hearts/Rings
content: On Saturday, January 20, 2024, Maplers on all Worlds will have Miracle Time enabled for Face Accessories, Eye Accessories, Pendants, Shoulders, Rings, Earrings, Belts, Badges, Emblems, and Android Hearts!

title: More Identisk Events to Enjoy!
content: It's time for the Identisk Festival Celebration! Head over to Identisk to check out the final additions to the island!

title: Miracle Winter - January 13 - Shoes
content: On Saturday, January 13, 2024, Maplers on all Worlds will have Miracle Time enabled for Shoe Equipment!

title: Miracle Winter - January 6 - Tops/Bottoms/Overalls/Capes
content: On Saturday, January 6, 2024, Maplers on all Worlds will have Miracle Time enabled for Tops, Bottoms, Overalls and Cape Equipment!
